definition: A group or institution that focuses on safeguarding and preserving the natural environment, often through advocacy, education, and implementing measures to reduce pollution and promote sustainability. It is commonly used to refer to non-profit organizations or associations dedicated to environmental protection and conservation efforts.

examples.german: Die Umweltschutzorganisation setzt sich für den Schutz der Natur ein.
examples.english: The environmental protection organization advocates for the protection of nature.
The environmental protection organization regularly organizes clean-up campaigns.

examples.german: Die Umweltschutzorganisation informiert über nachhaltige Lebensweisen.
examples.english: The environmental protection organization provides information about sustainable lifestyles.
The environmental protection organization fights against environmental pollution.

examples.german: Die Umweltschutzorganisation setzt sich für den Erhalt bedrohter Tierarten ein.
examples.english: The environmental protection organization advocates for the preservation of endangered species.
